title: BXROIU Personal Safety Alarm with LED Light, Personal Security Siren for Women, Kids, Elders (Rose gold + Black)
features: 【Loud Emergency Siren】This personal safety alarm emits an ear-splitting 130-140dB siren to deter threats and draw attention in emergencies, offering you effective and reliable safety assistance
【Portable and Convenient】 Designed with a compact and lightweight body, this alarm can be easily attached to bags, backpacks, keys, or belts, ensuring it’s always within reach.
【Bright LED Light】 Features a built-in LED flashlight, ideal for use in dark or low-light conditions to illuminate locks, paths, or other objects
【Impact-Resistant Construction】 Engineered with durable ABS materials and an eco-friendly design, this alarm offers reliable protection and longevity for daily use
【Multi-Purpose Safety Solution】 Suitable for women, children, the elderly, outdoor enthusiasts, and lone workers. Perfect for walking, jogging, hiking, or everyday commuting
description: Product Description Pocket personal alarms offer versatile functionality and serve as an exceptional security measure for individuals of all demographics. Especially beneficial for women, children, seniors, walkers, joggers, hikers, and those who work independently, these alarms provide peace of mind in various scenarios. Their sleek design allows them to double as a fashionable accessory, easily attachable to keychains, handbags, or backpacks. Equipped with a practical lanyard, they seamlessly integrate into daily routines, offering both protection and style. With integrated mini-LED lights, the pocket alarm proves to be a reliable companion, even in low-light conditions. Featuring powerful LEDs, it offers bright illumination, aiding in locating door locks or bags effortlessly. Moreover, it serves as a practical tool for lighting up dark pathways, enhancing safety and visibility during nighttime activities Personal alarms are invaluable for night runners and solo walkers, offering a sense of security during nocturnal activities or solitary strolls. When feeling uneasy or walking alone at night, activating the alarm instantly draws attention from nearby individuals, facilitating swift assistance or intervention. This immediate response fosters a heightened sense of safety and reassurance. Personal alarms serve as indispensable tools for parents, offering peace of mind, particularly when their children are traveling solo or in crowded public areas. These alarms provide children with a means to respond to emergencies swiftly, empowering them and instilling a sense of security. Attention : If the alarm sounds weak, kindly remove the screw on the back cover and replace the batteries. Please note that this Personal Alarm is not waterproof. Product Specifications: Siren: Approximately 130-140dB Battery: 3 x LR44 Dimensions: 62mm x 42mm x 25mm Packaging Details: Each pack contains 2 pieces of Personal alarms
